casebody.data:
2002-0268 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Jamie HAGER. No. 2002-K-0268. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Hager, Jamie;—Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. M, No. 278194; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KA 0058.

Denied.
